document.full_text: mr. friedlander founded the libertarian magazine reason in his college dorm room in 1968 and ran it briefly before dropping out of sight for the next 40 years.
document.title: lanny friedlander, founder of reason magazine, dies at 63
lines_and_colors: mr. friedlander founded the libertarian magazine reason in his college dorm room in 1968 and ran it briefly before dropping out of sight for the next 40 years.
